tasks.name: format-all-javascript
tasks.description: Format all JavaScript files using Prettier with consistent configuration
tasks.prompt: Format all JavaScript and TypeScript files in the ish-automation project using prettier with standard configuration, ensuring consistent code style across all 266 files

tasks.name: add-comprehensive-jsdoc
tasks.description: Add comprehensive JSDoc documentation to all TypeScript functions
tasks.prompt: Add detailed JSDoc comments to all TypeScript functions across the entire codebase, including parameter types, return types, examples, and usage descriptions for better IDE support and code clarity

tasks.name: standardize-error-handling
tasks.description: Standardize error handling patterns across all modules and services
tasks.prompt: Review and standardize error handling patterns in all modules, ensuring consistent try-catch blocks, proper error logging with Winston, and standardized error response formats across the entire automation system

tasks.name: optimize-package-dependencies
tasks.description: Optimize package.json dependencies and update to latest stable versions
tasks.prompt: Review package.json, update all dependencies to their latest stable versions while ensuring compatibility, remove any unused dependencies, and organize scripts in logical categories with better descriptions

tasks.name: enhance-typescript-configuration
tasks.description: Improve TypeScript configuration and add strict type checking
tasks.prompt: Enhance tsconfig.json with stricter type checking options, add path mappings for better imports, improve module resolution, and ensure all TypeScript files properly utilize strict typing throughout the project

tasks.name: add-comprehensive-logging
tasks.description: Implement structured logging across all automation modules
tasks.prompt: Add comprehensive Winston logging to all automation modules, ensuring consistent log formats, proper log levels, structured metadata, and correlation IDs for tracking automation workflows across the system

tasks.name: update-documentation-index
tasks.description: Update and expand the documentation index with current project status
tasks.prompt: Review and expand DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md to include all current modules, APIs, and configurations. Add current project statistics, setup instructions, and ensure all documentation is current and comprehensive for the 266-file project

tasks.name: implement-health-monitoring
tasks.description: Add comprehensive health monitoring and metrics collection
tasks.prompt: Implement health monitoring endpoints for all critical services, add metrics collection for automation performance, create health check routes, and ensure system observability across the entire automation platform

tasks.name: enhance-security-measures
tasks.description: Review and enhance security measures across all modules
tasks.prompt: Conduct comprehensive security review of all modules, implement input validation, sanitize data handling, add rate limiting where appropriate, and ensure all external API calls include proper security headers and error handling

tasks.name: add-performance-optimizations
tasks.description: Optimize performance bottlenecks in automation workflows
tasks.prompt: Analyze and optimize performance bottlenecks in automation workflows, implement caching strategies for repeated operations, optimize database queries, and improve overall system responsiveness across all automation modules

tasks.name: standardize-configuration-management
tasks.description: Standardize configuration management across all environments
tasks.prompt: Standardize configuration management using the existing config system, ensure environment variables are properly validated, add configuration validation, and implement consistent configuration loading patterns across all modules

tasks.name: enhance-test-coverage
tasks.description: Improve test coverage across all automation modules
tasks.prompt: Review existing test coverage and add comprehensive tests for all critical automation modules, ensure edge cases are covered, improve test documentation, and maintain high test quality standards across the entire project

tasks.name: cleanup-unused-code
tasks.description: Remove unused code and optimize file organization
tasks.prompt: Identify and remove unused code, dead functions, and redundant files across the 266-file project. Optimize imports, consolidate duplicate functionality, and ensure clean, maintainable code organization throughout the codebase
